home.title: BLACKSEA ELECTROMOBILITY
home.publicStations: Electric mobility and the popularity of electric passenger vehicles has been growing rapidly over the last decade and this trend doesnâ€™t show any signs of slowing down.
home.muncipalities: Municipalities: Primorsko, Byala, Dolni Chiflik, Dulgopol, Kavarna and Nessebar
home.stationInfo: EV-CCS charging column up to 22kW with one or two charging contacts. TYPE 2.
home.freeChargeDesc: Charging from the 22kW municipal charging stations is completely free
home.programDesc: The application was created within the framework of the project BGENVIRONMENT-4.004-0010 'Black Sea Electromobility', financed under the Agreement for the provision of BFP No. D-33-9/31.03.2023, which is implemented with the financial support of the Program 'Environmental Protection and climate change' of the Financial Mechanism of the European Economic Area 2014-2021
home.workTogether: Working together for <1>greener</1>, <2>more competitive</2>, and <3>more inclusive</3> Europe!
